title: The extraordinary life of Sultan Selim I
itunes:title: The extraordinary life of Sultan Selim I
itunes:subtitle: Alan Mikhail explains how Ottoman Sultan Selim I transformed the empire in the early 16th century. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
Historian Alan Mikhail, author of a new biography of the Ottoman Sultan Selim I, explains how he transformed the empire in the early 16thcentury – with important consequences for the rest of the world. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
